posts.post_title: FS: Signed Polar Bear Paddy Livingston PSA
posts.post_content:
For sale is a signed Paddy Livingston T206 with Polar Bear back in PSA 2 with 9 auto. Ask is $2,000 obo. Pop 1, none higher. 

Thanks for looking. 

I can accept PPGS/FF, zelle, wire, venmo, etc.
